fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi {{ recipient.first_name }},

Thanks for hosting a Repower at Home event on
{{ content_object.when|date }} at {{ content_object.start|time }}. Because of leaders like you,
we're on our way to meeting our energy savings goal of 7 million pounds of coal.

Your next step is to invite guests. Get started now.

Use your event's page to manage every aspect of
your event. On the event's page, you can:

  • Check the status of your guests
  • Make someone else a co-host
  • Send reminder and announcement emails to your whole guest list
  • Check off steps on your way to the event

After your event, you'll be able to enter your guests' commitments on the events
page. This will pre-load their accounts, allowing them to start saving energy right
away.

On this call you'll learn more about Repower at Home and how you can be part of the movement. Click here to RSVP. If you have questions about the call or how you can get involved, contact Brian Ward at brian.ward@climateprotect.org, or call (202) 567-6800.

Cheers,
The Repower at Home team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Once you create an event
fields.subject: Your Repower at Home event

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi {{ recipient.first_name }},

So far, {{ content_object.confirmed_guests.count }} {{ content_object.confirmed_guests.count|pluralize:"person,people" }} have responded to you event invitation, but your still waiting on
{{ content_object.outstanding_invitations }} other{{ content_object.outstanding_invitations|pluralize}}: {% if content_object.outstanding_invitations %}

    {% for guest in content_object.guests_that_have_not_responded %}
  • {{ guest }}
    • {% endfor %}
{% endif %} Time to give these holdouts a gentle nudge in the right direction. Click here to send them a reminder email.

Some people overlook emails in their inbox. Calling these guests can go a long way. If you've already spoken to them, you can update their RSVP status on your event's page.

Cheers,
The Repower at Home team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: 1 week after after you create an event
fields.subject: Guest list update for your Repower at Home event

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi {{ recipient.first_name }},

Your event is on {{ content_object.when|date }}, one week from today! {{ content_object.confirmed_guests.count }} of your guests have
confirmed their attendance, but your still waiting to hear from {{ content_object.outstanding_invitations }} more.

  • Send a reminder email to all the guests who are coming
  • Encourage holdouts to RSVP

Cheers,
The Repower at Home team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: 1 week before the event
fields.subject: Finish your preparations for your Repower at Home event

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi {{ content_object.first_name }},

Your event is right around the corner! It's an exciting time,
but don't forget to nail down the final details.

First, send one last reminder to your guests.

Next, make sure to print out all of your meeting materials

Have a great time at the event! We'll see you again soon after the event when you enter your guests' commitments.

Cheers,
The Repower at Home team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: 48 hours before the event
fields.subject: Your Repower at Home event is less than 2 days away!

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi {{ recipient.first_name }},

Good work organizing your event yesterday! Because of your leadership, a whole
bunch of new people are now engaged in the movement for a cleaner, better world.

Help your guests get to the next level. Enter their commitments from your
event. This will remind them of their goals and get them motivated. The sooner you
enter the commitments, the sooner they can start saving energy.

You can also take this opportunity to invite your guests to a team. Teams are
a great way to keep in touch with your guests and plan future projects as a group.

Cheers,
The Repower at Home team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Day after the event
fields.subject: Enter your guests' commitments

fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hey {{ recipient.first_name }},

You're all set to attend {{ content_object.creator.first_name }}'s event tomorrow:
Location: {{ content_object.place_name }}
{{ content_object.where }}
{{ content_object.location.place }}, {{ content_object.location.st }} {{ content_object.location.zipcode }}
Time: {{ content_object.start|time }}
Date: {{ content_object.when|date }}

Cheers,
The Repower at Home team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Day before the event
fields.subject: {{ content_object.creator.first_name }}'s event is tomorrow!

message: 1 week after after you create an event
